title: CRO Report Company Intelligence
description: GTM technographics and business signals extracted from executive sales job postings. Data updated weekly.

company_intelligence.description: Company intelligence database with technographics and sales signals

companies.title: Companies
companies.description: Unique companies from executive sales job postings with aggregated data

company_tools.title: Tech Stack
company_tools.description: Tools and software mentioned in job postings by company

columns.mention_count: Number of job postings mentioning this tool

company_signals.title: Sales Signals
company_signals.description: Sales methodology, customer segment, and motion signals by company

columns.mention_count: Number of job postings with this signal

companies_using_tool.title: Companies using a specific tool
companies_using_tool.description: Find all companies that mention a specific tool in their job postings
companies_using_tool.sql: SELECT c.name, c.stage, c.industry, ct.tool_name, ct.mention_count FROM companies c JOIN company_tools ct ON c.id = ct.company_id WHERE ct.tool_name LIKE :tool ORDER BY ct.mention_count DESC

enterprise_meddic.title: Enterprise companies using MEDDIC
enterprise_meddic.description: Find enterprise-focused companies that use MEDDIC sales methodology
enterprise_meddic.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.name, c.stage, c.avg_salary_max FROM companies c JOIN company_signals cs ON c.id = cs.company_id WHERE cs.signal_value LIKE '%Enterprise%' AND c.id IN (SELECT company_id FROM company_signals WHERE signal_value LIKE '%Meddic%') ORDER BY c.avg_salary_max DESC

top_tools_by_category.title: Most popular tools by category
top_tools_by_category.description: See which tools are most frequently mentioned in each category
top_tools_by_category.sql: SELECT tool_category, tool_name, SUM(mention_count) as total_mentions, COUNT(DISTINCT company_id) as company_count FROM company_tools GROUP BY tool_category, tool_name ORDER BY tool_category, total_mentions DESC

signal_distribution.title: Signal distribution
signal_distribution.description: Distribution of signals across all companies
signal_distribution.sql: SELECT signal_type, signal_value, COUNT(DISTINCT company_id) as company_count, SUM(mention_count) as total_mentions FROM company_signals GROUP BY signal_type, signal_value ORDER BY signal_type, company_count DESC

high_salary_with_tools.title: High-salary companies with specific tech stack
high_salary_with_tools.description: Companies with avg salary > $200K and their tools
high_salary_with_tools.sql: SELECT c.name, c.stage, c.avg_salary_max, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ct.tool_name) as tools FROM companies c LEFT JOIN company_tools ct ON c.id = ct.company_id WHERE c.avg_salary_max > 200000 GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.avg_salary_max DESC LIMIT 50
